mapper.sql: cw_donation_id as cwDonationId , dn_donated_phone as dnDonatedPhone , create_time as createTime , dn_life_status as dnLifeStatus , dn_donated_pic as dnDonatedPic , dn_donater_org_name as dnDonaterOrgName , create_by as createBy , dn_donated_org as dnDonatedOrg , dn_donater_id as dnDonaterId , dn_donation_way as dnDonationWay , dn_donation_pic as dnDonationPic , dn_attr2 as dnAttr2 , dn_donated_detail_msg as dnDonatedDetailMsg , dn_donater_org as dnDonaterOrg , update_by as updateBy , cw_donation_type as cwDonationType , dn_donated_msg_id as dnDonatedMsgId , dn_donated_name as dnDonatedName , update_time as updateTime , dn_donater_pic as dnDonaterPic , dn_attr1 as dnAttr1 , dn_donation_status as dnDonationStatus , dn_donate_goods_qty as dnDonateGoodsQty , dn_donater_name as dnDonaterName , dn_attr3 as dnAttr3 , dn_donated_id as dnDonatedId , dn_donated_org_name as dnDonatedOrgName , dn_attr4 as dnAttr4 , dn_donate_goods as dnDonateGoods , dn_donated_addr as dnDonatedAddr , dn_donation_desc as dnDonationDesc , dn_attr5 as dnAttr5 , dn_donater_phone as dnDonaterPhone
mapper.insert:
insert into cw_donation( cw_donation_id ,
dn_donated_phone ,
create_time ,
dn_life_status ,
dn_donated_pic ,
dn_donater_org_name ,
create_by ,
dn_donated_org ,
dn_donater_id ,
dn_donation_way ,
dn_donation_pic ,
dn_attr2 ,
dn_donated_detail_msg ,
dn_donater_org ,
update_by ,
cw_donation_type ,
dn_donated_msg_id ,
dn_donated_name ,
update_time ,
dn_donater_pic ,
dn_attr1 ,
dn_donation_status ,
dn_donate_goods_qty ,
dn_donater_name ,
dn_attr3 ,
dn_donated_id ,
dn_donated_org_name ,
dn_attr4 ,
dn_donate_goods ,
dn_donated_addr ,
dn_donation_desc ,
dn_attr5 ,
dn_donater_phone
) values ( #{cwDonationId } , #{dnDonatedPhone } , #{createTime } , #{dnLifeStatus } , #{dnDonatedPic } , #{dnDonaterOrgName } , #{createBy } , #{dnDonatedOrg } , #{dnDonaterId } , #{dnDonationWay } , #{dnDonationPic } , #{dnAttr2 } , #{dnDonatedDetailMsg } , #{dnDonaterOrg } , #{updateBy } , #{cwDonationType } , #{dnDonatedMsgId } , #{dnDonatedName } , #{updateTime } , #{dnDonaterPic } , #{dnAttr1 } , #{dnDonationStatus } , #{dnDonateGoodsQty } , #{dnDonaterName } , #{dnAttr3 } , #{dnDonatedId } , #{dnDonatedOrgName } , #{dnAttr4 } , #{dnDonateGoods } , #{dnDonatedAddr } , #{dnDonationDesc } , #{dnAttr5 } , #{dnDonaterPhone } )
